variants.Description in input context: E46K, A30P, A53T, and A30P/A53T mutations in α-synuclein (αS) associated with familial Parkinson's disease and altered aggregation kinetics.

Material used.Description: Used to measure aggregation kinetics of α-synuclein mutants.
